chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Okay, so we have an idea of what machine learning is.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Kind of.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: But then there's other things, right?

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Like AI, artificial intelligence, data science, deep learning, neural networks.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: What are all those things?

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Now, let's look at machine learning and how it fits into some of the other words you may

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: have heard.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Now, you have to keep this diagram in mind.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: You see, it all starts with AI or artificial intelligence, which simply means a human

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: intelligence exhibited by machines.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: An AI is a machine that acts like a human.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And currently in our industry, we have something called narrow AI.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That is, machines can be just as good or even better than humans at specific tasks.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: For example, detecting heart disease from images or at a game of go or chast or starcraft

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: and other video games, but each AI is only good at one task.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Narrow AI that we currently have simply means those machines can only do one thing really

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: well.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: They can be like humans and have multiple abilities.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That's called general AI.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And it's something that we're very, very far away from now.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Machine learning is a subset of AI.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And machine learning is an approach to try and achieve artificial intelligence through

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: systems that can find patterns in a set of data.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And actually Stanford University describes machine learning as the science of getting computers

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: to act without being explicitly programmed.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That is getting machines to do things without us specifically saying, do this, then do

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: that, if then, if this, if this, then that.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And don't worry, we'll explain that more throughout the section.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Now you may have also heard of deep learning and deep learning or deep neural networks is

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: just one of the techniques for implementing machine learning.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: For now, you can just think of it as a type of algorithm.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: But then we have this other thing that we've heard of, right?

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That's also very popular.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That is data science.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And often the role of a data science and machine learning expert are quite overlapping.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And most job descriptions actually don't even have a clear distinction between what is

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: a machine learning expert and a data science expert.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: The field of data science simply means analyzing data, looking at data and then doing something

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: with it, usually some sort of a business goal.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: So when we talk about machine learning, there's a lot of overlap with data science.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And that's why this course is called machine learning and data science.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: If you are a data scientist, you need to know machine learning.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: If you are a machine learning expert, you need to know data science.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: So throughout the next couple of videos, we're going to be talking about both of these topics

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: because both of them relate and overlap.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And you can't do one without the other because you need to be able to understand data and

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: work with data to do any of these things.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That's why when we talk about careers, often things like machine learning, data scientist,

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: data analyst, they're all similar because they all work with data.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: And from that data, they want to derive some sort of action for their business, for the

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: company or for their users.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Now in this course, we're really focusing on the application side of things.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That is the day to day use of machine learning and data science.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: We won't focus on theoretical academic research, which means you won't need a PhD or be super

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: smart mathematician or statistician to do the scores.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: The focus is on using machine learning and data science to be productive and to get job

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: ready.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Because that's what companies want right now.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Now when Daniel starts introducing data science and machine learning, he'll combine these

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: two into one and move this machine learning circle inside of data science.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: That's because the goal of the course is to encompass this entire data science field

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: and teach the machine learning aspects within data science.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: By the way, you might be wondering, hey, what about this whole data engineering thing

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: that I've heard about?

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Another term isn't it?

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: What about that?

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Talk about that, Andre.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: Well, you know what?

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: We have a whole section on it later on in the course.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: So for now, pretend like it doesn't exist.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: We'll get to it.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: I promise.

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: So now that we have an idea of what these big words are, let's have some fun in the next

chunks.title: AIMachine LearningData Science.mp3
chunks.text: video.
